name: Laser Defender (Shiv)
description:
You know it, you've seen it, you've played it - Space Invaders is something you have seen on machines ranging from bulky arcade machines all the way down to iPods.

This particular version is made (as a learning project, hence the free price) for Windows computers. No installation required, all you need is a keyboard and mouse!

I'm making this open source, so I'm adding the link to the GitHub repo here
